name: Suhoor Hero
description:
You are a Ramadan Drummer who takes his drum and goes out to the streets to wake people up for suhoor. But everything is not as easy as it seems! You should watch out for street dogs. By playing the drum sounds correctly in a row you can make the dogs sit, or you can hop into a pickup and calmly continue playing the drums. Here you go! Get your drum and hit the streets.

Note: The game was a planned to be a rythm game in first place. Because the copyright negotiations failed for the musics, musics are disabled :(. In previos updates it is planned to make rythms on no copyright sounds.
